pages.text: Just as we started MC16, Minecraft 1.17 was released. We wanted to support this as well and since at the time Forge support was lagging behind we took a switch to Fabric. Since there are not as many tech heavy mods out there yet for Fabric this is a low tech adventure mod pack this time around, but with 1.17!$(br)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/modpacks/squirrelpak-mc17)SquirrelPAK MC17 Info$(/l)
